The fragrance of precepts and meditation will cause clouds to rise and mist to swell.
The torch of wisdom and the torch of wisdom cause the moon to shine brightly and the stars to shine brightly.
The udumbara flower exhales with an auspicious cloud of smoke.
The fruit of enlightenment is ripened and sweet dew congeals.

source_sentence: 碧琉璃瓶內雪浮三吸趙州茶。
translation: Snow floats in three sips of Zhaozhou tea inside a turquoise-glass vase.

source_sentence: 紅碼碯甌中霜清一滴曹溪水。
translation: A drop of Cao Xi water is frost-clear in a red-gemmed pouf.
Their treasures are all in abundance.
Each of the sacred pearls is radiant and round.
The syrup that coats it clarifies a hundred flavors.
The five fragrances of the meal are refined and clean.
The hazel robe is brightly colored, and the tasting medicine is fragrant.
The medicines they offer are fragrant.
Now, I'll present each of them to Neng Ren.
I hope you'll have the compassion to accept them together.
Incense bearer.
"The price of this submerged sandalwood is beyond compare.
It burns brightly in a golden censer and emits auspicious clouds.
Its fragrance pervades the three thousand worlds.
It's a symbol of goodness and prosperity that surrounds the Bhagavān.
Now, we venerate the Buddha's service.
We offer incense of light (exchanging it with other things).
We hope the noble ones will be kind enough to accept it.
Please accept it (lifting one's head in hope and weeping to the south).
He offers this incense.
It's made of submerged water and fragrant sandalwood.
A hundred harmonious fragrances surround the Dharma realm.
It's good and auspicious, and it circles the Vulture Peak.
We ask the Buddha to descend to the human realm.
The flower...
"The Bhagavān used to grasp it with his golden hand.
Kāśyapa's sublime intention was conveyed with reverence.
From then on, this sudden enlightenment came to him at Vulture Peak.
One branch with five petals benefits humans and gods.
"The flower is consecrated.
"Who planted the five petals?
It's on the banks of the Tuṣita Heaven.
It opened in front of the Buddha at the assembly on Vulture Peak.
Kāśyapa sent it here for you.
The lantern...
The patriarch's flames shine brightly as he lines the jeweled dais.
In the past, the venerable came with an arrow in his hand.
Who knew that there were tens of thousands of red lotus seeds?
They were scattered onto the site of enlightenment this very night.
The lamp was consecrated.
They shone out into the world.
The Dama himself transmitted the flame of the Ratnaketu.
"The succession of lamps is never idle.
From this moment on, they break through the barrier of darkness.
Tea bearer.
The stone wheel crushes the buds of early spring.
It pours out of a floating pot and scatters milk flowers.
After sipping it, a crisp breeze rises from both of his arms.
Don't say that Zhao Lao cooks tea well.
This tea is offered.
Its flavor is always rare.
In the past, Zhaozhou himself planted it.
Tonight, the faithful man offered it to Muni.
It's cooked, and snowflakes fly.
"The fruit of the fruit...
Freshly cut grains are presented on a golden platter.
Meditators from all over the world raise their eyes to look at it.
The twin phoenixes come to present the Buddha in person.
The wild monkeys still clamber with all their hearts.
They consecrate the fruit.
Jasper chews red incense.
It's sweet, filling his intestines with fragrance and penetrating his crown.
The gold tray holds out a jade bowl with a fragrant aroma.
It's worthy of an offering to the king of the Dharma.
The worshipper...
"When he gathered the incense pile from the Brahma Heaven, he was still receiving the minced jade milk of the palace maids.
They were still receiving the minced milk of the palace maids.
"If the monk at the top had the adamantine eye.
Why would he need Mañjuśrī to drop a spoonful?
He offered it up for purification.
He no longer envies the floss.
The hundred flavors and treasures are too embarrassing to offer to the Buddha.
There's not much more than a little recognition in the divine kitchen.
After the meal, he attains meditative concentration.
"Waterman!
The blue waves of the ocean flow together with the sky.
Every time he goes out into the vast ocean, he sends a giant boat.
Mount Gusan used to subdue an army of 100,000.
They lit up the branches of the bodhisattva's willow.
The water is consecrated.
It follows the vessel from square to round.
It was once directed to Avalokitêśvara's willow.
It turned into sweet dew that sprinkled 3,000 li.
The flames turned into red lotuses.
Those who smeared them with...
The gold cup and submerged water have the most subtle fragrance.
It's a drink of jade liquor that's bestowed as pure ghee.
It removes fever and vexation for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 更教心地獲清凉(云云同前)。
translation: It also teaches the mind ground to attain coolness (clouds are the same as the previous).

'Nectar, milk, and jasper juice.'

"Jewel!
"The red-hot stove is ripe with ore and the upper pincer hammer.
He strikes the golden-haired lion child.
"You can't imagine Bianhe's empty, weeping jade.

source_sentence: 於中還有老胡知(云云同前)。
translation: There's still Old Man Hu who knows about it (clouds in the same vein as before).
"He offers this jewel.

White jade and gold are the most precious.
Coral and onyx are flawless.
The Buddha is offered at the dragon-flower.
The pearl...
"The two dragons never stop fighting.

"Do you still know that the sea treasure is personally acquired?

source_sentence: 莫向摩尼境外求(云云同前)。
translation: Don't look beyond the borders of the maṇi (clouds as before).

source_sentence: 重樓鎮鎻在曹溪(云云同前)。

Medicine man.

He can save sentient beings from illness and pain.

source_sentence: 頓令熱惱作清凉(云云同前)。
translation: It suddenly turns feverish afflictions into coolness (clouds as before).
He consecrates medicine.
Its effectiveness is truly marvelous and difficult to fathom.
It saves sentient beings from suffering and illness.
It's difficult to discern the quality and merit of this medicine in the world.
There's a true formula for the mind ground.

source_sentence: 上來所陳諸供養　　能令利益遍虗空　我今宣演妙真言　　合會聖賢咸攝受曩謨娑婆怛它孽多度波補澁波你波碾馱頗羅未鄰補佐銘迦三母捺囉三摩曳吽(一遍)唵誐誐曩三婆嚩韈日囉斛(二遍)普奉献。
translation: The offerings presented above can cause benefits to pervade the whole sky. Now, I'll proclaim this wonderful true teaching, which will be accepted by all the sages in the assembly.
"Twelve wonderful causes and conditions.
He focuses on them in order and presents them in praise.
Welcoming good fortune and collecting blessings, they resolve grievances.
The sages' views are limitless.
